name: test_e2e_with_logs[731_REDIR_NULL_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_NULL_001` |
| **Name** | Null byte redirect |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | null_byte |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `next=https://evil.com%00.good.com`
- **Encoded**: `next%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%00.good.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~17000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:42.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] XSS Filter Bypass Attempt test_id=REDIR_NULL_001-1772277102928-aou2o pattern_id=REDIR_NULL_001 uri=/?q=next%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%00.good.com client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] XSS Filter Bypass Attempt test_id=REDIR_NULL_001-1772277102928-aou2o pattern_id=REDIR_NULL_001 uri=/?q=next%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%00.good.com client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
11:11:42.000000000: Warning [NGINX XSS] XSS Filter Bypass Attempt test_id=REDIR_NULL_001-1772277102928-aou2o pattern_id=REDIR_NULL_001 uri=/?q=next%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%00.good.com client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
